text: (napiye!) Evarkal ciramankalaic cakittut tankal iraivanin tiru mukattaiye nati avanaiye kalaiyilum, malaiyilum (pirarttanai ceytu) alaittuk kontirukkirarkalo avarkalutan um'maiyum nir akkik kolviraka. Ivvulaka alankarattai nir virumpi attakaiya (nalla)varkalai vittu umatu kankalait tiruppi vitatir. Tan carira iccaiyaip pinparriyatan karanamaka evanutaiya ullattai nam'mait tiyanippatiliruntu nam tiruppi vittomo avanukkum nir kilppatiyatir. Avanutaiya kariyam ellai katantu vittatu
